alert.note: Alert for Dodge (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 7:27AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Dodge County through 815 AM CDT... At 726 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over West Concord, or 9 miles northwest of Dodge Center, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Dodge County, including the following locations... County Roads 1 And 24, Concord, Eden, County Roads 20 And 5, Highway 57 And 570th Street and Berne. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
